Several factors have contributed to my anxiety. A few are that I am not as motivated to watch my pre-recorded lecture as if I was going to class, the professors are reading off of powerpoints, there is a lack of guided interactive work to make up for the lost in-person-lecture advantage, and consistent technology issues have made it difficult to follow along with any live discussions.
